Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: allaah ke naam se jo rahamaan va raheem hai.
taareef allaah hee ke liye hai jo tamaam qaayanaat ka rab hai.
ham teree hee ibaadat karate hain, aur tujh hee se madad maangate hai.
un logon ka raasta jin par toone inaam faramaaya, jo maatoob nahin hue, jo bhatake hue nahin hai.
